description: This source file defines a React component named ProtectedRoute that guards child routes based on user authentication status. It uses React hooks and react-router-dom for navigation and session handling, redirecting unauthenticated users to the home page and showing a loading indicator while verifying authentication.

methods.name: ProtectedRoute({ children })
methods.description: A React functional component that protects its child routes by checking user authentication status and redirecting unauthenticated users to the home page.
